turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user

turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let's take it one step at a time. So we have: ((x-2)(2x) - (x^2 + 1)(1)) / (x-2)^2. Now, let's focus on just the numerator. Expand (x-2)(2x) and (x^2 + 1)(1). What do you get?
